Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.events.events_for_client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventForClient
    Generic event that can be received by the client
    VisitorClient  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ack
    The event confirm the reception by the server and the controller of the command identified by operationConfirmed
    ChooseBuild
    Event that carries the list of the of the valid combinations of coordinates and level where a new level of a tower can be built
    ChooseColor
    This event contains the color which the client can choose to display his workers coloring those
    ChooseFirstPlayer
    The event carries the list of all the players to permit to the challenger to choose who will be the first player to move
    ChooseGod
    Event that carries the list of God's cards that cam be chosen by the player
    ChooseGodsDeck
    Event directed to the challenger to ask him to select as many God's card as the number of players
    ChooseMove
    Event that list the possible coordinates where the selected worker can be moved
    ChooseWorker
    Event that ask to the player to chose one of his worker to play the turn
    ChooseWorkerPosition
    Event that ask to the player where place the worker, the workerNum identifies the worker that must be collocated on the map, it's useful in case the player try to position the worker on an invalid square, in this case the request is reiterated with the same workerNum
    Disconnection
    Event that inform all the remaining players that at least one player has disconnected from the match
    EndEvent
    The event signal that the match reach it's end and then all the client must terminate their execution
    GameIsStarting
    The event signal to all the client that the setup phases of the game is ended and now the match will start, the event also carry all the information needed to the clients to decorate the game board, for instance the list of the gods chosen by each player and their color
    Lose
    Event that inform the player that he lost the match
    MakeDecision
    Event that ask to the receiver player to make a binary decision on the argument carried in the toDecide string
    MapUpdate
    Event that carries the updated map, that may be caused by a moved worker or due to a new level that as been built
    Nickname
    Event that inform all the users of a new player indicating it's nickname
    NumberOfPlayer
    Event that ask to the player who is creating the match of how many player it must be composed
    OutOfRoom  
    Ping  
    SpecificUserEvent
    Event that must be send to a specific player
    TurnIsEnd
    The event signal to the specified player that it's turn is ended
    UnsuccessfulOperation  
    Win
    Event that inform the player that he won the match
